translation.en: -♪ Chico ♪ -♪ Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.es: Chico Bon Bon, Chico, Chico Bon Bon.

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon Bon ♪
translation.es: Chico Bon Bon, Chico, ¡Chico Bon Bon Bon!

translation.en: ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪ ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
-I saw a m-m-monkey! -[all] Tool belt!
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.es: Chico Bon Bon, Chico, Chico Bon Bon.

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪ ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
Monkey with a tool belt!
[Rainbow] "Chico Bon Bon and the Ice Cream Monster!"
translation.es: ¡Chico Bon Bon y el ladrón de helados!

translation.en: I scream, you scream, we all scream for…
Ice cream?
Chico, I love that you've re-engineered my Fridgey Boo Boo
translation.es: Chico, me encantaque hayas rediseñado mi Refricito

translation.en: to make ice cream,
but it keeps coming out melty.
Oh, I think I see the problem, Mrs. Coleslaw.
There must be something wrong with Fridgey's insulation.
translation.es: El aislante térmico debe estar roto.

translation.en: Oh dear! His what, now?
Insulation.
Check it out. Fridgey Boo Boo's got a freezing machine to make ice cream,
translation.es: Refricito tiene una máquina congeladoraque hace helados,

translation.en: and this foam material is insulation.
translation.es: y este material de espuma es aislante.

translation.en: It's what keeps the ice cream cold once it's made.
translation.es: Es lo que mantiene frío al helado.

translation.en: The foam insulation makes it hard for heat to get in.
translation.es: Esa espuma dificulta la entrada de calor.

translation.en: That's why Fridgey can keep things cold.
translation.es: Por eso Refricito mantiene el frío.

translation.en: Looks like Fridgey Boo Boo doesn't have enough insulation.
translation.es: Y parece que no tiene suficiente aislante.

translation.en: That's why the ice cream comes out melty.
translation.es: Por eso el helado sale derretido.

translation.en: Oh no! What do we do, Chico?
Don't worry. I'll just add some more foam for better insulation.
translation.es: Descuide, agregaré más espumapara mejorar el aislante.

translation.en: There. Now you've got the perfect ice cream making machine.
translation.es: Listo Ahora tiene la máquina perfectapara hacer helados.

translation.en: Go on, give it a try.
Well, all right.
Nice and cold, just the way I like it.
Insulation!
Thank you, Chico.
And thank you, Fridgey Boo Boo.
The banana phone!
Chico Bon Bon! You got a problem? We can solve 'em!
translation.es: ¡Chico Bon Bon!¡No hay problema que yo no resuelva!

translation.en: [in Italian accent] Freddy and Betty Lemuretti here.
Has this ever happened to you?
You're enjoying a delicious ice cream treat
when a giant monster grabs it right out of your hand?
translation.es: ¿y de repente un monstruo gigantese los quitó?

translation.en: No, that's never happened to us.
Actually, it has happened to us.
translation.es: De hecho, nos acaba de pasar.

translation.en: [both] Us too!
More ice cream!
That monster ate all of our ice cream!
And she's still hungry!
More ice cream!
Say no more. We're on our way!
translation.es: No se diga más. ¡Vamos en camino!

translation.en: Fix-It Force, we need to feed that monster fast,
or she'll destroy Blunderburg looking for more ice cream.
translation.es: o destruirá Blunderburgen busca de helado.

translation.en: It's time to bring the ice cold awesome!
translation.es: Es hora de traer el helado genial.

translation.en: [kids] Chico Bon Bon!
Rainbow Thunder!
Clark!
Tiny!
I'm Neil Ostrich here on the scene.
translation.es: Soy Neil Ostrichen el lugar de los hechos.

translation.en: Literally, on the scene.
There's a monster on the loose in Blunderburg
translation.es: Hay un monstruo suelto en Blunderburg

translation.en: and it's hungry for one thing:
translation.es: y tiene hambre de una cosa:

translation.en: ice cream!
I don't-- Whoa!
More ice cream!
Cones, sundaes, novelty treats…
No form of ice cream is safe!
Who can save the city from that ice-cream-craving creature?
translation.es: ¿Quién salvará a la ciudadde esa criatura que devora helados?

translation.en: More ice cream!
I'm Chico Bon Bon, monkey with a tool belt!
translation.es: Soy Chico Bon Bon,un mono con herramientas.

translation.en: And we're the Fix-It Force!
And that's one big monster!
Which means we need a monster-sized serving of ice cream to fill her tummy,
translation.es: Por eso necesitamosun helado gigantesco para saciarla,

translation.en: so she'll never come after our ice cream again.
translation.es: así nunca más vuelve por nuestros helados.

translation.en: But Betty and I will never be able to make enough!
translation.es: Pero Betty y yonunca podremos hacer suficiente.

translation.en: Then what we need is all the ice cream left in Blunderburg.
translation.es: Entonces, necesitamos todo el heladoque queda en Blunderburg.

translation.en: Operation Ice Cream begins now!
Our tastiest mission yet!
[Neil] As the Ice Cream Monster continues her rampage,
translation.es: Mientras el Monstruo del Helado sigue,

translation.en: Mayor Murphy has declared a level-five ice cream emergency!
translation.es: la Alcaldesa Murphy declaróuna emergencia de helado de nivel cinco.

translation.en: Citizens of Blunderburg, the Fix-It Force needs your ice cream!
translation.es: Ciudadanos de Blunderburg,¡Los Reparadores necesitas sus helados!

translation.en: Thanks, Mayor!
-All right! -So much ice cream!
[Clark] Our bowl is full!
Then it's time to feed the monster!
More ice cream!
-[Chico] Quick! Release the ice cream! -Uh, Chico, I think we're too late.
translation.es: ¡Rápido! ¡Suelten el helado! Chico, creo que llegamos tarde.

translation.en: What do you mean?
The ice cream's all melted!
No melty ice cream!
Okay, so she really doesn't like melty ice cream.
translation.es: De acuerdo,no le gusta el helado derretido.

translation.en: We've gotta figure out a way to keep the ice cream cold long enough
translation.es: Busquemos la formade mantener el helado frío

translation.en: to feed that monster.
Yeah, like with a freezer!
But it would need to be a monster-sized freezer.
translation.es: Pero tendría que serun congelador gigante.

translation.en: A monster-sized freezer!
That's a great idea, Clark!
Rainbow, set a course to Mrs. Coleslaw's house.
translation.es: Rainbow, vamos a casa de la sra. Coleslaw.

translation.en: Chico, are you sure you wanna do this?
Remember what happened the last time Fridgey Boo Boo
transformed into Fridgebot?
Oh, I remember!
He went through town shooting ice cubes at everything!
translation.es: ¡Disparaba cubos de hieloa todos en la ciudad!

translation.en: I know, but he's our only hope.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero es nuestra única esperanza.

translation.en: Now presenting…
[Chico] Fridgebot 2.0, the perfect ice cream delivery machine.
translation.es: a Refrigerabot 2.0,la máquina de helados perfecta.

translation.en: Now with ice cream blasting power!
Too melty!
Oh! It just needs a little more insulation to keep all that ice cream cold.
translation.es: Necesita un poco más de aislantepara mantener frío el helado.

translation.en: And… we're good to go!
I even loaded up some new ice cream jokes.
Why do ice cream cones carry umbrellas?
Why?
Because there's always a chance of sprinkles!
translation.es: ¡Porque es posible que vaya a chispear!

translation.en: More ice cream!
The Ice Cream Monster, she's coming this way!
translation.es: ¡El Monstruo del Helado viene por aquí!

translation.en: We've gotta feed her, fast!
Let's go, Fridgebot!
Bye-bye, Fridgey! Have fun, now.
I'm reporting live from downtown Blunderburg,
translation.es: En vivo desde el centro de Blunderburg,

translation.en: where the hungry Ice Cream Monster is still searching for ice cr-- Whoa!
translation.es: donde el hambriento Monstruo de Heladosigue buscando…

translation.en: Nom? Ice cream?
More ice cream!
[Chico] Hey, Ice Cream Monster!
Okay, Fridgebot, do your thing! Ice cream blasters, go!
translation.es: ¡Bien, Refrigerabot, haz lo tuyo! ¡Explosión de helado!

translation.en: Activate booster cannons!
How's about a little strawberry and some chocolate chip!
translation.es: ¿Qué tal un poco de fresay chispas de chocolate?

translation.en: Ooh! Don't forget peanut butter! And rainbow sprinkles!
translation.es: - ¡No olvides la mantequilla de maní!- ¡Y las chispas!

translation.en: [gasps] I think it's working!
More ice cream!
[Clark] What?
She still wants more?
I don't think she'll stop until she's totally full,
translation.es: No se detendrá hasta que esté llena,

translation.en: and even Fridgebot can't feed her fast enough!
You're right, Rainbow.
We need to make her a super-sized bowl of ice cream so she can really chow down.
translation.es: Le prepararemos un tazón de helado gigantepara que coma todo.

translation.en: But where are we gonna find a bowl big enough to serve a giant monster?
translation.es: ¿Dónde encontraremos un tazón gigantepara un monstruo gigante?

translation.en: [Chico] Giant bowl… Giant bowl…
[gasps] The Blunderdome.
It's just the right size and shape
translation.es: Es del tamaño y forma perfectos

translation.en: for the biggest, baddest bowl of ice cream ever!
translation.es: para el tazón de heladomás gigantesco del mundo.

translation.en: Fridgebot, fill it up!
Now, mint!
Now, vanilla!
Now, blunderberry!
And finally… the cherry on top.
translation.es: Y, por último, la cereza del pastel.

translation.en: Whoa-ho-ho! That ought to be enough for the monster!
Uh… guys! The ice cream is already melting! We gotta keep it cold!
translation.es: Chicos, el helado se derrite.¡Debemos mantenerlo frío!

translation.en: We spent all this time collecting the ice cream and now it's going to melt!
translation.es: Todo este tiempo recogimos el helado,¡y ahora se derretirá!

translation.en: We have to figure out how to keep the Blunderdome
translation.es: ¿Cómo mantendremos frío el Blunderdomopara que no se derrita?

translation.en: cold enough to keep it from melting. What if it doesn't work?
translation.es: ¿Cómo mantendremos frío el Blunderdomopara que no se derrita? ¿Y si no funciona?

translation.en: Chico? Maybe now's a good time for a banana break.
translation.es: Chico, quizá sea hora de un banadescanso.

translation.en: [Chico] Okay, the monster wants ice cream,
-but we can't keep the ice cream cold. -[buzzing]
Fridgey Boo Boo can only keep it cold when it's inside him.
translation.es: Refricito solo lo mantiene fríodentro de él.

translation.en: -Outside, it melts! -[buzzing]
Because there's no insulation.
Insulation!
Blazing bananas, that's it! We need insulation.
translation.es: ¡Por mil bananas, eso es! Necesitamos aislante térmico.

translation.en: Oh yeah!
If we insulate the entire Blunderdome, we can keep the ice cream cold.
translation.es: Si aislamos todo el Blunderdomo,mantendremos el helado frío.

translation.en: Great idea!
Rainbow, activate foam cannon and prepare to insulate.
translation.es: Rainbow, activa el cañón de espumay prepárate para aislar.

translation.en: -Hang on to your whiskers! -[engine revs]
Folks, I can't believe what I'm seeing.
translation.es: Amigos, no puedo creer lo que veo.

translation.en: The Fix-It Force are insulating the Blunderdome with foam!
translation.es: ¡Los Reparadores están aislandoel Blunderdomo con espuma!

translation.en: -We did it! -Yeah!
[Chico] The ice cream isn't melting!
It's an insulation sensation!
-[Clark and Thunder] Whoa! -She is hungry!
All full!
-[all cheering] -She's full!
Bye-bye!
We saved the city, Fridgebot.
Now there's only one thing left to do…
[Chico] Ice cream! Come get your ice cream.
Mmm! Thanks for the ice cream, Chico.
The Ice Cream Monster's gone for good! Thank you, Chico.
translation.es: ¡El Monstruo del Heladose fue para siempre! Gracias, Chico.

translation.en: We couldn't have done it without Fridgey Boo Boo here.
Oh! I love you, Fridgey Boo Boo!
What is ice cream's favorite day of the week?
translation.es: ¿Cómo quedó el hielo después de caerse?

translation.en: [all] What is it?
Sunday!
Oh, Fridgey Boo Boo!
